nodes.text: Falko's Spear was a battered wind rider owned by the minor crime lord Ray Carantar. Carantar entered the Falko's Spear into the Festival of the High Winds, the annual wind rider race on Sevarcos II. During the Galactic Civil War, Carantar's crew was replaced by a team of undercover Alliance operatives with the mission of rescuing Alliance agent Carter Escalon from a spice-mining prison.
